[size=15pt]Combat[/size]
* Perfect combat with all specials working and all correct timers * Perfect switching * Spawn tabs for instant PK * No overpowered items * Pk tokens system * No lag or disconnects * Fully working items lost on death * All spells working including magic orbs. * Active Pk community

item.title: Purechaos - Instant PK 24/7 | PvM | Minigames | Spawn and Play
item.dc:creator: @yoeril yoeril
item.description:
@yoeril wrote:

Picture’s are 100% made by me and are from my server, I dont know how you came to the conclusion that I stole or leeched them.

In the picture you can see the name ‘Blaze’, that is me. Look on our homepage and you will find the name there.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Decent enough if people are still looking for a server like this. Good luck, but as Loveandpower said, I would suggest not leeching images for your own server. Create your own.
